text: Why do these pictures and nicknames matter?  It could show a glimpse into his heart and or potential bias on issues that need his input.  Two yearbooks with racial controversy, during his adult years is not a coincidence!
author: AprilDRyan

text: Virginia's governor now says it wasn't me!  However, last night he acknowledge one of the characters,  blackface or klansman was him.  He needs to also explain the other yearbook pic where his nickname was Coonman!  Two yearbooks can't be explained away.  Resign!
author: AprilDRyan

text: The governor originally said one of those figures (klansman or blackface) was him and he did not tell us which one.  And, he has not said anything about that other yearbook where his nickname was Coonman.  He is spinning a web to try to keep his job.  He seems to be a liar.

text: I grew up on music by The Queen of Soul, Aretha Franklin. I had various opportunities to talk with her. I saw her perform several times. Once during the Obamas Women of Soul performance and at the White House Correspondents Association dinner in 1999. May the Queen rest in power!
author: AprilDRyan

text:
STATEMENT OF ERIC HOLDER ON PASSING OF ARETHA FRANKLIN 
I am so saddened to learn of the passing of an American icon. Aretha Franklin was indeed the Queen of Soul.  But she was so very much more. She commanded R-E-S-P-E-C-T, deservedly received it and made it possible for others.
author: AprilDRyan
